===Noun===
{{ja-noun|がくせい|kyu=學生}}

# [[student]] (''in school'')

====Derived terms====
* {{ja-r|小学生|しょうがくせい}}: primary (elementary, grade) school student
* {{ja-r|中学生|ちゅうがくせい}}: middle (junior high) school student
* {{ja-r|高等学校学生|こうとうがっこう がくせい}}: high school student; more commonly {{ja-r|高校生|こうこうせい}}
* {{ja-r|大学生|だいがくせい}}: college student
* {{ja-r|大学院生|だいがくいんせい}}: graduate student
* {{ja-r|学生証|がくせいしょう}}: student ID card
